content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Postgraduate taught assessment results are now available for students reaching a progression position or an award outcome. You can access these by logging in to Blue Castle with your university username and password. Please ensure you check this information even if you are aware of your results. This will inform you whether you are required to retake any assessments. For more information, please visit the assessment webpages. If you have any queries about your assessment results, we suggest that you take a look at our FAQs in the first instance. If you still canâ€™t find the answer to any questions, please contact Student Services.
